sentences.sContent: We often use it to describe some uproarious festivities.
sentences.sContent_eng: We often use it to describe some uproarious festivities.
sentences.sCn: 我们通常用它来形容一些骚动的庆典。

sentences.sContent: Organ, melodious dance, cheerful songs, comedy… I love to see it is the comedy school, the young actors that funny words, interesting action makes us uproarious.
sentences.sContent_eng: Organ, melodious dance, cheerful songs, comedy… I love to see it is the comedy school, the young actors that funny words, interesting action makes us uproarious.
sentences.sCn: 有悠扬的电子琴、优美的舞蹈、欢快的歌曲、喜剧学院……我最爱看的就要数喜剧学院了，小演员们那搞笑的话语、有趣的动作逗得我们捧腹大笑。

remMethod.val: up (上) + roar (吼叫) + ious → 楼上半夜有人吼叫， 引起人们骚动 → 骚动的
